body:
Comment 14: 
I believe you are compiling Go from source with GOROOT set to the value of a previous
version of Go you installed possibly via a tarball or OS X installer.

Do these three steps.

1. sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
2. edit your .bashrc or similar to remove /usr/local/go/bin from your $PATH
3. edit your .bashrc or similar to remove any reference to $GOROOT. This value is not
required and setting it will cause a reoccurance of this issue in the future.
_Labels changed: removed **priority-triage**._
